text: You went down to the woodlands one?
The store do not exist at all there no such unit. However there are many ppl like us going down n mentioned SG durian
We should come up with a list of problematic customers n pin it

"Hi  will require you to deliver sealed and packed durians. Payment will be made via paynow to your account after all job done  and once done will request from my finance to make payment.Once accepted order  please let me know your whatsapp number and also paynow number so that i can get my team to text you and coordinate with you and he will let you know the type of photos we will require to take."
Omg someone just took this Yishun - 2x admiralty - AMK orders

Ok let me clarify1. The durian we are sending are labels as sg durian
I went down to their stores ar woodlands as indicated on their website and there is no such unit and store at woodlands

Check with all the businesses owner there about sgdurian they diverted me to a store with a old man sitting there. I confronted the old man.. the old man 1st reply was agitated.. he mention I no longer partner with sgdurian.they run away with my money and show me all the police report they make against the owner of sg durian.. unfortunately I cannot send the video here
The old man inform I am not the 1st one coming there to look for sgdurian
LOL the yishun - admiralty - AMK orders popped up again  same durian order
Then I mentioned I collected sg durian from 554 miltonia condo.. the old man cited that is where the sg durian owner resides
He keep encourage me to make a police report as many have made a report against sgdurian already
Those who wan the video pls pm me I be glad to share with evidences of this dodgy business
And renting out that mini Mart for it

These people are smart. That condo is probably rented. Then once too many issues  they will move again. These kinda sketchy business owners think they can run all the time.
They can operate under different entities
Behind man still same person.. saying that goes left pocket go in right go out and vice versa
How legit is this link? Scared this are the type which can access our bank account. Scammer kind

Should report to LLM as well to ban this sender. Pity those driver/rider who dun know and took this order. If its a company structure kind of payment (get approval from management)  sender should be the one paying us first and they claim from their company  not us their "non-employee" waiting for approval to get payment.
For those who still want to continue doing LLM please be aware that you may having the same issue as me. Take care  especially those new bird
